agentCard.name: Intelligent Llm Priority Manager Agent
agentCard.description: AI-powered priority management system that intelligently allocates LLM resources based on plugin importance, user-defined priorities, business logic, and real-time demand. Ensures critical processes get LLM access first while optimizing resource utilization through dynamic priority scoring, cost-aware scheduling, and comprehensive policy management.
